testCase.name: Byte range validation
testCase.description: Values assigned to byte contexts should be validated for 0-255 range

testCase.name: Word range validation
testCase.description: Values assigned to word contexts should be validated for 0-65535 range

testCase.name: Memory address range validation
testCase.description: Memory addresses should be validated for 16-bit range

testCase.name: Zero-page optimization hints
testCase.description: Zero-page addresses should generate optimization hints

testCase.name: Function parameter type validation
testCase.description: Builtin functions should validate parameter types

testCase.name: String escape sequence validation
testCase.description: String literals should validate escape sequences
